Contact us

Contact

The Salmon software is developed by Rob Patro at Stony Brook University in collaboration with Geet Duggal and Carl Kingsford at the Computational Biology Department at Carnegie Mellon University, with contributions from Steve Mount at the Center for Bioinformatics and Computational Biology at the University of Maryland, College Park.

We’re very interested to hear others’ feedback about using Salmon for their projects and in their pipelines. To this end, Salmon is actively developed on GitHub and we interact regularly with users on our Google Group.
